author: Off to Neverland Travel
title: Disney Cruise Line速 Issues Travel Advisory for Tropical Storm Erika
text:
Disney Cruise Line速 Issues Travel Advisory for Tropical Storm Erika 
Last Update: 8/27/15 3pm Eastern 
As of 3pm on Thursday, Aug. 27, 2015, Disney Cruise Line has issued the following update regarding Tropical Storm Erika: 
Disney Cruise Line is monitoring the current weather conditions and path of Tropical Storm Erika. At this time, we have made no changes to our itineraries. Should weather conditions change, we can alter the itinerary of our ships to ensure the safety and comfort of our Guests.
